![c0TFxPu.png](http://i.imgur.com/c0TFxPu.png)

The Kerbike is the only choice for any KSC aerospace engineer, with it's aerodynamic streamlining, and smooth ride.

Trim (Alt+w) is suggested for normal travel, when you want to stop, hit brakes and the aeroshell will open for easy exit and entry.

It is surprisingly stable, however because of it's inherently compact design, it requires careful piloting, although ever effort has been made to make it as stable as possible.

![Z1m2WKs.png](http://i.imgur.com/Z1m2WKs.png)

Enjoy, and thanks for reading!

[Download](http://kerbalx.com/Mad_Rocket_Scientist/Kerbike-By-AMRSD)

-MRS
